CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Time dependent DFT calculations show that the absorption band in the longer wavelength is mainly attributed to the transition from HOMO delocalized in the D-A backbone to LUMO localized in DTP units for all the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO delocalized in the D-A backbone |
| LUMO localized in DTP units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO delocalized in the D-A backbone of the polymers |
| LUMO localized in DTP units of the polymers |

Note: "D-A backbone" and "DTP units" can be considered material properties as they refer to specific structural features of the polymers.
